- nisansale ma thaniyen + thaniya makannata mage hitha langatama awudin - nisansale oba thaniyen + thaniyata obe sitha langatama awudin - nisansale ee salana susum pem gi gayuwa obe namin + sasala dethol nisala handin - dasaka golu wunu thaniya niwalana dasak sewwemi sasara pura + anduru nishawaka pipunu sandak se oba hamu wuwa no sithu lesin geya padamalawa: kusum piris nisansale ma thaniyen githaya methanin ahanna,ganna nihanda nisansala mohothaka hudakala wu sithe doragulu wiwara karana aadaraya, wirahawa an mohothata wada wadiyen dane.
